tool_description: HiRo API - Converting Hindi Roman Queries to English
name: HiRo Hindi Roman translator
title: HiRo Hindi Roman translator

api_list.name: hiroTranslator
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hiro-hindi-roman-translator.p.rapidapi.com/pipeline"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hiro-hindi-roman-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://hiro-hindi-roman-translator.p.rapidapi.com/pipeline"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hiro-hindi-roman-translator.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
